text: The New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians is an encyclopedic dictionary of music and musicians. == Sources == * Blom, Eric, editor (1954). Grove's Dictionary of Music and Musicians (fifth edition). New York: St. Martin's Press () and London: Macmillan (). ** Supplementary volume, associate editor Denis Stevens, 1961, New York (), London (). ** Fifth edition reprints: 1966: New York (, London (); 1968: New York (); 1970: New York (); 1973: New York (), London (); 1975: New York (), London (, ISBN 978-0-333-19174-3.). ==Other websites== * Grove, George, ed.; A dictionary of music and musicians 1450-1889 (1900), 4 Volumes. Internet Archive. Volume 1 Volume 2 Volume 3 Volume 4 :Second edition: Vol. 1 (1904) A–E, Vol. 2 (1906) F–L, Vol. 3 (1907) M–P, Vol. 4 (1908) Q–S, Vol. 5 (1910) T–Z, Appendix * , San Francisco Symphony Orchestra * 'Oxford Music Online (contains Grove Music Online)', Rutgers University Libraries Category:1878 books Category:Encyclopedias Category:Music media Category:Classical music Category:Dictionaries
title: The New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians
